Guangning county in Zhaoqing 肇慶|肇庆[Zhao4 qing4], Guangdong

sentences.english: Guangning is the home of bamboo and famous for its picturesque scenery .
sentences.chinese: 广宁是著名的竹子之乡，以优美的自然景色而出名。

sentences.english: Located in the northwest of Guangdong province, Guangning is a beautiful city.
sentences.chinese: 位于广东省的西北部，广宁是一个美丽的城市。

sentences.english: The "Guangdong green" jade deposit is situated in Wuzhishan area, Ningxian county, Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: “广东绿”玉石矿床发育于广东省广宁县五指山地区。

sentences.english: Immediate statement on behalf of Zhang Guangning.
